thread.title: Shirley E. Curfman is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional
thread.title_full: Shirley E. Curfman is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Shirley E. Curfman is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional
text:
Continental Who's Who
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Shirley E. Curfman is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional in the field of Legal Services. Shirley is a Partner at Seyfarth Shaw, LLP.
With over 800 attorneys in locations throughout the US, London , Sydney , Melbourne and Shanghai , Seyfarth Shaw's legal teams work one on one with clients to fully understand their needs and strive to execute top tier legal services while maintaining the highest level of professionalism and customer service.
An esteemed attorney with over three decades of experience practicing law, Shirley's areas of concentration include arbitration, corporate finance and lending, compliance, derivatives, securitizations, mergers and acquisitions derivatives and more.
Shirley has attained consecutive recognition by her peers as one of the Best Lawyers in America in Banking and Finance Law and has been recognized in Southern California Super Lawyers. Throughout the course of her illustrious career, she has maintained close ties with the American Bar Association, State Bar of California , Los Angeles County Bar Association and is a member of the Founders Leadership Council of the Education Foundation for the Commercial Finance Association and an Emeriti Governor of the Institute for Corporate Counsel.
A testament to her success, Shirley was honored as a VIP Woman of The Year by the National Association of Professional Women. She is also a member of Strathmore Who's Who and was honored as Professional of the Year in 2008, and listed in the Presidential Who's Who among Business and Professional Achievers for 2008-2009. Shirley serves as a director on a number of boards, including the nonprofit corporation, Global Friends Network.
Shirley earned her JD in Law from UCLA Law School and her undergraduate degree in English from Azusa Pacific University where she graduated magna cum laude.
For more information, please visit www.seyfarth.com
Contact: Robert Basilin , 516-825-5634 pr@continentalwhoswho.com
